<h1 class="title">Animate:  Move Mouse or Touch to Attract or Scroll to Resize</h1>

Aquesta animació interactiva permet **interactuar amb scroll, ratolí o pulsació**.

<div class="instructions">
<h3>Animate by Jordi Rosell</h3>
  Move Mouse or Touch to Attract or Scroll to Resize | License: <a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/2.5/" target="_blank">CC BY-NC 2.5</a> | Code: <a href="https://github.com/jrosell/scrollytelling/blob/main/posts/animate.qmd" target="_blank">github repo</a> | Inspiration from <a href="https://mastodon.social/@nrennie@fosstodon.org/116100028313153338">Nicola Rennie</a>
</div>


<canvas id="canvas"></canvas>

<script>
    const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

    let particles = [];
    let mouse = { x: null, y: null, radius: 120 };
    let globalScale = 1;

    const colors = [
        'rgba(235, 150, 100, 0.75)', 
        'rgba(100, 180, 200, 0.75)', 
        'rgba(210, 100, 120, 0.75)', 
        'rgba(180, 190, 150, 0.75)', 
        'rgba(140, 120, 170, 0.75)'
    ];

    // --- Event Listeners ---

    window.addEventListener('resize', init);

    // Desktop Mouse
    window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
        mouse.x = e.x;
        mouse.y = e.y;
    });

    // Mobile Touch
    window.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
        mouse.x = e.touches[0].clientX;
        mouse.y = e.touches[0].clientY;
    }, { passive: false });

    window.addEventListener('touchmove', (e) => {
        mouse.x = e.touches[0].clientX;
        mouse.y = e.touches[0].clientY;
        // Prevent scrolling page while interacting
        e.preventDefault(); 
    }, { passive: false });

    window.addEventListener('touchend', () => {
        mouse.x = null;
        mouse.y = null;
    });

    // Scroll to resize
    window.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
        globalScale += e.deltaY * -0.001;
        globalScale = Math.min(Math.max(0.3, globalScale), 4);
    });

    class Square {
        constructor(x, y) {
            this.x = x;
            this.y = y;
            this.baseX = x;
            this.baseY = y;
            this.size = Math.random() * 25 + 8;
            this.color = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
            this.density = (Math.random() * 20) + 2;
        }

        draw() {
            ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
            const scaledSize = this.size * globalScale;
            ctx.fillRect(this.x - scaledSize/2, this.y - scaledSize/2, scaledSize, scaledSize);
        }

        update() {
            if (mouse.x !== null) {
                let dx = mouse.x - this.x;
                let dy = mouse.y - this.y;
                let distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
                
                if (distance < mouse.radius) {
                    let forceDirectionX = dx / distance;
                    let forceDirectionY = dy / distance;
                    let force = (mouse.radius - distance) / mouse.radius;
                    
                    this.x += forceDirectionX * force * this.density;
                    this.y += forceDirectionY * force * this.density;
                } else {
                    this.returnToOrigin();
                }
            } else {
                this.returnToOrigin();
            }
        }

        returnToOrigin() {
            if (this.x !== this.baseX) {
                let dx = this.x - this.baseX;
                this.x -= dx / 15; // Elastic return
            }
            if (this.y !== this.baseY) {
                let dy = this.y - this.baseY;
                this.y -= dy / 15;
            }
        }
    }

    function init() {
        canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
        canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
        particles = [];

        // Density adjustment: fewer squares on smaller screens for performance
        let area = canvas.width * canvas.height;
        let numberOfParticles = area / 3500; 

        for (let i = 0; i < numberOfParticles; i++) {
            let x = Math.random() * canvas.width;
            let y = Math.random() * canvas.height;
            particles.push(new Square(x, y));
        }
    }

    function animate() {
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
        for (let i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {
            particles[i].update();
            particles[i].draw();
        }
        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }

    init();
    animate();
</script>
